entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries becoming mixed with rain showers near noon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023
